action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@damage 1} piercing damage, and the target must make a DC 10 Constitution saving throw, taking {@damage 2d4} poison damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. {@damage 1d6+2} piercing damage.

action.name: Constrict
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. {@damage 1d8+2} bludgeoning damage, and the target is {@condition grappled} (escape DC 14). Until this grapple ends, the creature is {@condition restrained}, and the snake can't constrict another target.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 10 ft., one creature. {@damage 2d6+4} piercing damage.

action.name: Constrict
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. {@damage 2d8+4} bludgeoning damage, and the target is {@condition grappled} (escape DC 16). Until this grapple ends, the creature is {@condition restrained}, and the snake can't constrict another target.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. {@damage 1d10+2} piercing damage, and the target is {@condition grappled} (escape DC 12). Until this grapple ends, the target is {@condition restrained}, and the crocodile can't bite another target.

trait.name: Hold Breath
entries: The crocodile can hold its breath for 15 minutes.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The crocodile makes two attacks: one with its bite and one with its tail.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8} to hit, reach l5 ft., one target. {@damage 3d10+5} piercing damage, and the target is {@condition grappled} (escape DC 16). Until this grapple ends, the target is {@condition restrained}, and the crocodile can't bite another target.

action.name: Tail
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target not grappled by the crocodile. {@damage 2d8+5} bludgeoning damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a DC 16 Strength saving throw or be knocked {@condition prone}.

trait.name: Hold Breath
entries: The crocodile can hold its breath for 30 minutes.
